name: Square Adventure (kingfoxxo)
description:
Description:

You are a square, and you have to get to the goal avoiding various obstacles that will make your objective very hard. It looks easy, and it´s easy... in the correct hands.

This is a beta with the first 10 stages. If you find an error, please tell me at my social media, or leave it in the comments below.

It's my first game,  hope you like it.
